metadata.title: CVE-2014-9639 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Integer overflow in oggenc in vorbis-tools 1.4.0 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted number of channels in a WAVfile, which triggers an out-of-bounds memory access.

criterions.comment: vorbis-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
